text: Ora Engkantada was a popular Filipino children's fantasy show in 1986. It was hosted by Luz Fernandez, playing as "Lola Torya" while reading from a huge ancient book of magical stories. The show's signature song started as an instrumental but later on, lyrics were added that enhanced the theme of the show. It was originally broadcast by IBC but after the show was cancelled, reruns were broadcast by RPN. Category:Fantaserye and telefantasya Category:Intercontinental Broadcasting Corporation original programming Category:Radio Philippines Network Category:1986 Philippine television series debuts Category:1990 Philippine television series endings Category:Filipino- language television shows
title: Ora Engkantada
